name: Flashdark
description:
You were equipped with the state of the art Flashdark™ device

Now your mission is to bypass top level security, using the absence of electromagnetic radiation to your advantage

Once fired, the Flashdark™ device will generate complete darkness for brief moments, when charge runs out it will sound a warning beep and light will be restored, you must then wait for it to recharge, once recharged the LED lights on the device will turn green and you will hear a confirmation beep Remember: while using the Flashdark™ device you won't be able to see, so plan your movements beforehand

Controls:

MovementW, A, S, DJumpSpacebarFire beam of darknessLeft Mouse ButtonInteract when promptedE
